name: C. Load Balancing
statement:
In the school computer room there are servers which are responsible for
processing several computing tasks. You know the number of scheduled
tasks for each server: there are tasks assigned to the -th server.In
order to balance the load for each server, you want to reassign some
tasks to make the difference between the most loaded server and the
least loaded server as small as possible. In other words you want to
minimize expression , where is the most loaded server and is the least
loaded one.In one second you can reassign a single task. Thus in one
second you can choose any pair of servers and move a single task from
one server to another.Write a program to find the minimum number of
seconds needed to balance the load of servers.
